Plural-Forms: nplurals = 2; plural = (n != 1);
Language: fr
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Doesn’t follow the prompt or conversatio.msgid: Doesn’t follow the prompt or conversation history
msgstr: Ne suit pas l'invite ou l'historique de la conversation
Qu'est-ce qui a bien fonctionné pour vous ?

Remove one app from start to add this on.msgid: Remove one app from start to add this one
msgstr: Supprimez une application du début pour ajouter celle-ci

At least three apps must be pinned..msgid: At least three apps must be pinned.
msgstr: Au moins trois applications doivent être épinglées.
Échec du chargement du contenu d'assistance.

You do not have permission to access thi.msgid: You do not have permission to access this page.
msgstr: Vous n'avez pas la permission d'accéder à cette page.
État de la couche de routage

Are you sure you want to delete this cha.msgid: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
msgstr: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer cette discussion ?

You can download your conversation as ei.msgid: You can download your conversation as either a PDF or Word document.
msgstr: Vous pouvez télécharger votre conversation au format PDF ou Word.

Advanced Analytics: Analyze business dat.msgid: Advanced Analytics: Analyze business data in detail
msgstr: Analyses avancées : analysez les données de l'entreprise en détail
Quel est mon code de projet?

How do I apply for leave?.msgid: How do I apply for leave?

If you confirm deletion, this chat will.msgid:
If you confirm deletion, this chat will be permanently erased and
cannot be recovered.
msgstr:
Si vous confirmez la suppression, cette conversation sera définitivement effacée et
ne pourra pas être récupérée.

Thanks for your feedback! Help us improv.msgid: Thanks for your feedback! Help us improve by giving a few extra details.
msgstr: Merci pour ton retour ! Aide-nous à nous améliorer en donnant quelques détails en plus.

What did you like about the response?.msgid: What did you like about the response?

What went wrong - can you help understan.msgid: What went wrong - can you help understand?
msgstr: Qu’est-ce qui n’a pas marché – peux-tu nous aider à comprendre ?
Le fichier téléchargé est vide (0 Ko).

Uploaded file has more tokens than the l.msgid: Uploaded file has more tokens than the limit of the model (1,000,000 tokens).
msgstr: Le fichier téléchargé contient plus de jetons que la limite du modèle (1 000 000 de jetons).

Uploaded file has more pages than the li.msgid: Uploaded file has more pages than the limit the model can process (1,000 pages).
msgstr: Le fichier téléchargé comporte plus de pages que ce que le modèle peut traiter (1 000 pages).

File type not supported by the tool..msgid: File type not supported by the tool.
msgstr: Le type de fichier n’est pas pris en charge par l’outil.

An error occurred during document proces.msgid: An error occurred during document processing.
msgstr: Une erreur s’est produite lors du traitement du document.

Uploaded file size exceeds the allowed l.msgid: Uploaded file size exceeds the allowed limit (50 MB).
msgstr: La taille du fichier téléchargé dépasse la limite autorisée (50 Mo).

An unknown error occurred during file up.msgid: An unknown error occurred during file upload.
msgstr: Une erreur inconnue s’est produite lors du téléversement du fichier.

An error occurred during file upload..msgid: An error occurred during file upload.
msgstr: Une erreur s’est produite lors du téléversement du fichier.

A file could not be uploaded..msgid: A file could not be uploaded.
msgstr: Un fichier n’a pas pu être téléversé.

Some files could not be uploaded..msgid: Some files could not be uploaded.
msgstr: Certains fichiers n’ont pas pu être téléversés.

Neo is still in Beta. Please verify impo.msgid: Neo is still in Beta. Please verify important results.

Currently, you do not have access to Neo.msgid: Currently, you do not have access to Neo Proposal Assistant.

or reach out to us at.msgid: or reach out to us at

I have read and accept Capgemini's.msgid: I have read and accept Capgemini's

msgstr: conditions d’utilisation de Neo de Capgemini

I will at all times remain accountable f.msgid: I will at all times remain accountable for outputs and will double check them before use. I will protect personal and confidential information and intellectual property that might appear in outputs, and those of third parties which are used as inputs.
msgstr: Je resterai en toute circonstance responsable des résultats générés et je les vérifierai avant utilisation. Je protégerai les informations personnelles et confidentielles ainsi que la propriété intellectuelle pouvant apparaître dans les résultats générés, et celles de tiers utilisées comme données d'entrée.

I will not use Neo for prohibited practi.msgid: I will not use Neo for prohibited practices and will use Neo in line with the
msgstr: Je n’utiliserai pas Neo pour des pratiques interdites et je l’utiliserai conformément au

Capgemini Code of Ethics for AI.msgid: Capgemini Code of Ethics for AI
msgstr: Code d’éthique de Capgemini pour l’IA

File size exceeds the 50MB allowed limit.msgid: File size exceeds the 50MB allowed limit.

Upload Word, Excel, Powerpoint, PDFs, im.msgid: Upload Word, Excel, Powerpoint, PDFs, images, or zip files.
msgstr: Téléversez des fichiers Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, images ou ZIP.

Drag and drop your file here to include.msgid: Drag and drop your file here to include it in the conversation.
msgstr: Glissez-déposez votre fichier ici pour l’ajouter à la conversation.

No translated content found for this lan.msgid: No translated content found for this language.
msgstr: Aucun contenu traduit trouvé pour cette langue

If you confirm deletion, all chat histor.msgid:
If you confirm deletion, all chat history for this account will be
permanently erased and cannot be recovered.

Are you sure you want to delete all chat.msgid: Are you sure you want to delete all chat history?

Unable to delete chats. User info not av.msgid: Unable to delete chats. User info not available.
msgstr: Impossible de supprimer les conversations. Informations utilisateur non disponibles.
Toutes les conversations ont été supprimées.

Failed to delete chats. Please try again.msgid: Failed to delete chats. Please try again.
msgstr: Échec de la suppression des conversations. Veuillez réessayer.

Are you sure you want to log out?.msgid: Are you sure you want to log out?
msgstr: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir vous déconnecter ?

Failed to log out. Please try again..msgid: Failed to log out. Please try again.
msgstr: Échec de la déconnexion. Veuillez réessayer.
